original_title: Andrés Caicedo: Unos pocos buenos amigos
overview: Using the unfinished film, ANGELITA Y MIGUEL ÁNGEL, by Andrés Caicedo and Carlos Mayolo, as a structuring device, friends of prolific film critic and writer Andrés Caicedo, an unforgettable figure of the group of Cali in the 1970s who left an incredible amount of texts, reflect upon his life, his work, and his suicide at the age of 25, testify to his influence in the cultural life of Colombia, and remember his strong and touching personality.

production_companies.name: Compañía para el Fomento Cinematográfico - FOCINE

title: Andrés Caicedo: A Few Good Friends
